tool_description: Get crypto events like listings, airdrops, releases, tokenomics, partnerships, and more, grouped by days.

api_list.name: Events
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of upcoming crypto events such as listings, airdrops, releases, tokenomics, and partnerships, organized by date.

required_parameters.name: pageSize
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of events to return per page. The maximum pageSize is 10.
